837360.name: DC Universe Online™ - Episode 31 : Deluge
837360.description:
Starro’s back…but he isn’t alone! This time the invasion is worse than ever. Head below the surface to Spindrift Station, the all-new Atlantean Embassy, to figure out what’s really going on. Encounter new and updated characters like Aquaman, Black Manta, Mera, and more!

Deluge features a 1-player Solo [Story Mission], Open World Mission [Central City Deluge Zone], 2-player Duo [Spreading Spores], a 4-player Alert [Invasion!], and two 8-player Raids [The Threat Below & Spindrift Station]. It is free to access for Members or available for purchase in the in-game Marketplace.

• New characters, including Mera, Black Manta, and Corum Rath
• New locations including an ancient, proto-Atlantean temple and Spindrift Station
• New Rewards: a Spindrift Station “Drysuit” and Mera-inspired gear
• Members and Owners: Receive EXTRA treasure boxes at the end of content
